description: Demo of TrialMatchAI aggregating age and gender statistics for a metastatic NSCLC trial.

messages.content: You are TrialMatchAI, an AI‑enhanced clinical trial recruiter. Use the provided tools to parse eligibility criteria, query the EMR for matching patients, and return concise, compliant results. Keep audit logs and maintain patient privacy.

I have a new Phase III trial for metastatic non‑small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) targeting patients aged 45‑75, ECOG ≤1, with EGFR wild‑type, who have not received immunotherapy. Please give me the age and gender distribution of patients in our system who meet these criteria, limited to 200 patients.
Processing your request. I will first convert the free‑text criteria into a structured format, then search the EMR for matching patients.
